title: 2016 U.S. election : Twitter followers of candidates in September 2016
yAxis: Number of Twitter followers in millions
summary: This statistic indicates the Number of Donald_Trump_(@realDonaldTrump) and Hillary_Clinton_(@HillaryClinton) in households Twitter September in 2016 .
There were around 11.9 millions Donald_Trump_(@realDonaldTrump) in Twitter September households in 2016 , compared to approximately 9.3 millions Hillary_Clinton_(@HillaryClinton) .
gold: This statistic shows the number of Twitter followers of the 2016 U.S. presidential candidates , as of September , 2016 . As of September , 2016 , Donald Trump had approximately 11.9 million Twitter followers .
